struct.exostring: if spoken to after the initial, no sword possessed
the player has gotten the sword, has it in possession
the student moves to the academy entrance path and disappears

the player has gotten the sword, does not have it in possession
-------------------------------
Only a couple of things need to be scripted, here:
1 - the starting conditions for the first two lines. The top one (this one) checks to see if the player has gotten the sword from the spirit and doesn't have it. The second checks to see if the player has gotten the sword from the spirit and still has it.
2 - There is an End Condition off the second starting node (they all end connected to the same End Condition) which has the student leaving the valley permanently.
the student moves to the academy entrance path and disappears
the student moves to the academy entrance path and disappears
